TextView.android:text:
Step1:Dice paneer and veggies

 Step 2:Mix paneer,onion, capsicumtomato,ginger garlic paste,hung curd,ajwain, mustard oil,salt and black pepper.

 Step 3:Marinate them together for atleast 6hrs.

 Step 4:Divide them in 3 proportions.1st part as it is.

 Step 5:Add pinch of red colour in 2nd part

 Step 6:Add mint coriander chutney in 3rd part

 Step 7:Now set them in skewers

 Step 8:In a non stick pan, heat butter. Keep these sticks

 Step 9:Sprinkle lots of chaat masala on top before serving.

 Step 10:Serve hot with chutney and onion rings.
